short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One-click Zillow real estate data scraping: Extract and save data to XLSX/CSV files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock Zillow data in minutes. Zillow Data Exporter automatically extracts key listing information (price, bedrooms, bathrooms, address, and more) from search results pages and exports it to CSV/Excel files. Save time and effort â€“ analyze real estate trends and make informed decisions with ease.

ðŸŸ¤ How do I use ?
1. Open the zillow.com page with the property listings you want to extract.
2. Open the extension and click the "Start Extracting" button.
